name: Catwoman Crash
description:
A woman puts on her magic cat mask and becomes...uhm...Catwoman Crash? (she's working on the name)

Break into your horrible boss's home while he's on vacation and wreck everything you can, then get out. Don't get caught by security guards - knock them out by dropping heavy objects on them, landing on them yourself, or pouncing into them from behind.

Controls

Play with keyboard or controller.

  • Arrow keys, Left stick, D-pad - run left/right
  • Space key, A/B/X/Y/Squ/Tri/X/O button - jump
  • Down+Left+Jump or Down+Right+Jump - pounce
  • R key - restart
  • Alt+F4 - quit
Credits Design, Code, Art, SFX

Iori Branford

Additional Code

Godot Tiled Importer - vnen

Music

The Siamese Cat Song - The Jazz Networks

Font

Atari Font - Genshichi Yasui
